data.title: Gene Hackman Movies
data.meta_description: This is a weekly series that focuses on the career of Gene Hackman. data.text:
This is a weekly series that focuses on the career of Gene Hackman. Once a week, one film from Gene Hackman’s vast career will be individually viewed, analyzed, and ranked alongside his other films. By the conclusion of this weekly marathon, we seek to uncover what may be the best overall movie of Gene Hackman’s career, but also what could be considered his best performance.

Gene Hackman, winning his first Oscar during the 1972 Academy Awards for his performance in The French Connection (1971).

The following films will be reviewed, with the aim of evaluating and showcasing the extraordinary 30+ year career of Gene Hackman. Once reviewed, each movie title will have a link and small screenshot added.

Bonnie and Clyde (1967)

*Oscar Nominated Performance, Supporting Actor

I Never Sang for My Father (1970)

*Oscar Nominated Performance, Supporting Actor

The French Connection (1971)

*Oscar Winning Performance, Lead Actor

The Poseidon Adventure (1972)

*BAFTA Winning Performance, Lead Actor

The Conversation (1974)

*Golden Globe and BAFTA Nominated Performance, Lead Actor

A Bridge Too Far (1977)

Superman (1978)

*BAFTA Nominated Performance, Supporting Actor

Superman II (1980)

Under Fire (1983)

*Golden Globe Nominated Performance, Supporting Actor

Hoosiers (1986)

No Way Out (1987)

Mississippi Burning (1988)

*Oscar Nominated Performance, Lead Actor

Postcards from the Edge (1990)

Unforgiven (1992)

*Oscar Winning Performance, Supporting Actor

The Firm (1993)

Crimson Tide (1995)

Get Shorty (1995)

The Birdcage (1996)

*SAG Winner, Best Performance by a Cast

Absolute Power (1997)

Twilight (1998)

Enemy of the State (1998)

Heartbreakers (2001)

The Royal Tenenbaums (2001)

*Golden Globe Winning Performance, Lead Actor in Comedy/Musical

Gene Hackman, winning his second Oscar during the 1993 Academy Awards, for his performance in Unforgiven (1992).
